resources.string: "The most beloved actions to Allah are continuous ones, even if little..." -Bukhari and Muslim

Zakat is almsgiving for the poor and needy. It is the annual obligation of every Muslim male and female who has accumulated enough wealth (defined as the "nisab") to give 2.5% of the value of that wealth. Zakat can only be used for helping the poor and needy, and it cannot be used for buildings, maintenance, masjid or institutional operations. Not sure how much Zakat to pay? Use the zakat calculator at
